name: Meadow Chat (HTML 5)
description:
Meadow - HTML5 Platform/Chat Framework

Meadow is a base for multiplayer and dynamic single-player games.
Developed by PatchFix for Trample Path games.

Our Website, Patreon and Discord are getting some overhauls.
Find us at TramplePath.com

You can register a Trampler account for additional avatars in the client or here.

CONTROLS:

  • A / D  - Move Left and Right
  • Space  - Jump, Double Jump, and Wall Kick
  • Click - Move your hand
  • W - Vault on grass tufts
  • Z - Zoom
  • Tab - Chat Panel
  • Enter - Chat

CONNECTION INFO:

  • Static Login/Auth Server (NodeJS)
  • Cloud Gameplay Server (Heroku)
  • NoSQL Profile Server (MongoDB)
  • SSL Client handled by Socket.io
  • SSL Server handled by Node.js

Available Features Not Included:

  • High scores and leader boards with live profile updates
  • HTTP endpoints and Discord bot integration
